name: Chains of Memory (demo)
description:
The rain is pouring down hard... you return to your apartment, alone... as you get ready to go to bed you turn on your TV, and your favorite show is airing. All is good, everything is okay.

Chains of Memory by Studio Brainrot is a Yume Nikki fangame, heavily inspired by a JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure based TTRPG campaign, run by our very own Robin Lima, also titled Chains of Memory. Take the role of Hanatsuki, and explore the world of her dreams, all molded and shaped by her absolute favorite TV show, Chains of Memory. 

Please note, this is currently just a demo and we will be adding more in the future! This is just a taste of what’s to come. The campaign that the game is based on still is yet to be completed, so there’s plenty more content for Hanatsuki to watch and dream about :)

TW!! Blood, Gore & Body Horror
